trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around February 8th 2008
divs: Sighting Details I was sitting at my post as a security guard when I noticed up in the sky was a true blue light with one red one. I knew it was differant when I had been used to seeing red lights with turquase [OUR STUFF].So I got up and began following, I saw a tray in the sky, it was scudding under the clouds, it had a t-like design on the underside,it's a dark color and the craft or ship was light in color. Afterwards I was relunctant to report it fearing I would be designated insane and or spirited away to some hidden location. A month passed and I got the nerve to talk to someone I worked with, she suggested I tell MUFON. Another month went by and I worked up enough nerve to report and I did. Within months I got a call from one of your investigators on my voicemail and lost the call. Now it's been three years now, I report again and I hope I don't lose the call again.
Summary: Traylike,flying west to east, slight banking, turns southeast and flies east
